alert.note: Alert for Barren; Butler; Edmonson; Grayson; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 9:42AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky and south central Kentucky, including the following counties, in SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Grayson and Logan. In south central Kentucky, Barren, Butler, Edmonson, Simpson and Warren. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 842 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Morgantown, Brownsville, Plum Springs, Crestmoor, Memphis Junction, Mount Victor, Anderson and Auburn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Barren; Butler; Edmonson; Grayson; Logan; Simpson; Warren
